value: L 2 5 Martin Pl, Sydney, 2000, NSW, Australia

6726 - Unit Investment Trusts, Face-Amount Certificate Offices and Closed-End Management Investment Offices Summary > CHALLENGER INVESTMENT PARTNERS LIMITED is an Australian public company. Its operations cover unit investment trusts, face-amount certificate & closed-end mgmt investment offices. The company is not involved in the import or export of goods. CHALLENGER INVESTMENT PARTNERS LIMITED is headquartered in Sydney, New South Wales. It is headed by director John Bernard Power O'keeffe. For the 2024 financial year, the company reported revenue of $35.52 million. Its net profit totalled $13.95 million. CHALLENGER INVESTMENT PARTNERS LIMITED forms part of the finance, insurance, and real estate industry sector. Key Personnel > No key personnel were found for the selected company.
